description: Detect use of the Windows 8.3 short name. Which could be used as a method to avoid Image based detection
author: frack113
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Use NTFS Short Name in Image
query: ((process.executable.text:("*\~1.bat*" OR "*\~1.dll*" OR "*\~1.exe*" OR "*\~1.hta*" OR "*\~1.js*" OR "*\~1.msi*" OR "*\~1.ps1*" OR "*\~1.tmp*" OR "*\~1.vbe*" OR "*\~1.vbs*" OR "*\~2.bat*" OR "*\~2.dll*" OR "*\~2.exe*" OR "*\~2.hta*" OR "*\~2.js*" OR "*\~2.msi*" OR "*\~2.ps1*" OR "*\~2.tmp*" OR "*\~2.vbe*" OR "*\~2.vbs*") AND (NOT process.parent.executable.text:"C:\Windows\explorer.exe")) AND (NOT ((process.parent.executable.text:"*\\WebEx\\WebexHost.exe") OR (process.parent.executable.text:"*\\thor\\thor64.exe") OR (process.executable.text:"C:\PROGRA~1\WinZip\WZPREL~1.EXE") OR (process.executable.text:"*\\VCREDI\~1.EXE"))))
